I do recommend this game, especially if you played it before. Still has an active player base with lots of fun game modes that you can play. If you played csgo before and got used with the spray patters, keep in mind that here everything is almost random, but you can get the hang of it pretty fast.

Well, it's been 20 years since I first played CS 1.0 at a computer club. Classic tactical FPS that brings all the good memories back.
However, this game requires a significant amount of skill in order to be enjoyable and a huge investment of time to excel at it, so it's best suitable for youngsters.

El mejor shooter de todos los tiempos, un gran hito dentro de los videojuegos que marco un antes y despues muy dificil de superar, por el motor la dinamica del juego, el empujar a los players a desarrollar toda su destreza, resolucion de definir jugadas a base de pensamiento y pura skills, otro juego no te da ni te transmite lo que este juego hizo durante tantos a√±os hasta el dia de hoy, a pesar que hayan salido otras versiones obviamente basadas en esta obra maestra.
